robert laing wrote:
> thank you Noah
> it's a bit more clear now
> 
> i see a 'jmxclient' bash script available in heritrix2
> 
> even if i suggest to modify
> PASSWORD=`grep controlRole conf/jmxremote.password | cut -d= -f2`
> to
> PASSWORD=`grep controlRole conf/jmxremote.password | cut -d" " -f2`
> 
> 
> greets
